Posts.Content: May 5, 2010 11:09PM stellaK wrote: Mantra, Can I ask why you are on the nerve block medication? I had a mastectomy 10 months ago, and I still get a lot of sensations in the area. I have feeling pretty much in the whole area, but I feel strong tightness, needle piercing, etc, almost all the time. I am started thinking that it is time to see what can be done about it...
Posts.Title: numbness at surgery site Laurie_R Laurie_R
